definition: second month of autumn/8th month of the lunar calendar
second month of a season/middle/intermediate/second amongst brothers

sentences.english: In the Zhou Dynasty, the people celebrated the Mid-Autumn Festival to worship the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在周朝，人們開始慶祝仲秋並拜月。

sentences.english: Aug. 15 in lunar calender is called Mid-Autumn, because it is exactly in the middle of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 農曆八月十五日是秋天的正中，被稱爲中秋或仲秋。

sentences.english: In the 14th century, the eating of mooncakes at "Zhong Qiu Jie" was given a new significance.
sentences.chinese: 在14世紀，仲秋節喫月餅被賦予了另外一個意義。

definition: Double Ninth or Yang Festival/9th day of 9th lunar month
final month of summer (i.e. sixth month of lunar calendar)
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
early autumn/7th month of the lunar calendar
Bailu or White Dew, 15th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd September
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
final month of winter (i.e. twelfth month of lunar calendar)
the full moon/the fifteenth day of each lunar month
